org.ff4j.strategy

Class ServerFilterStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.strategy.AbstractFlipStrategy
      • org.ff4j.strategy.ServerFilterStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FlippingStrategy

    public class ServerFilterStrategy
extends AbstractFlipStrategy
    This strategy will check hostName and flipped only if it's contained in expected list.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)
